introduction.title: Greetings, I'm Juanes
introduction.description: Full-stack engineer from Medellín — I build digital experiences that connect, inspire, and move people.

experience.title: Student of Life
experience.description: Curiosity guides my journey. I grow through challenges, explore through code, and let each project shape who I become.

about-me.title: About Me
about-me.description: I see code as poetry — a way to translate thought into form. I create with intention, and let movement, people, and ideas inspire the next line.

main.heading: Crafting Digital Experiences From Concept to Scale
main.paragraph: Art and Technology may seem like two different and distant worlds, but building a bridge between them gives us the opportunity to discover a new world full of possibilities, where we can create and express human potential without limits.
